client.gui

Class OverallStatistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.OverallStatistic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class OverallStatistic
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The OverallStatistic class is designed to display the actions on the statistics screen by various filters

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OverallStatistic.Operation
      Operation is an enum variable that holds the various options for filtering graph data

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URL arg0,
                       ResourceBundle arg1)
        This method contains prompts for existing actions on the screen: Accept the possible courses for the combobox of filtering by courses and a blank screen from filters before clicking on the filter type

      • diplayGrapgh

        void diplayGrapgh(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method displays the data of the scores on the graph according to the requested filtering: COURSE,STUDENT or TEACHER
        Parameters:
        event -

      • StatisticNoteNavigation

        void StatisticNoteNavigation(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method displays on the screen an explanation message to the user about the filtering performed
        Parameters:
        event -

      • statisticByCourse

        void statisticByCourse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Is done after filtering by 'course'. It hides the student and teacher-related fill boxes and displays a combobox to select a course to filter for grades to be displayed on the graph
        Parameters:
        event -

      • statisticByStudent

        void statisticByStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Is done after filtering by 'Student'. It hides the fill boxes associated with the course and teacher and displays a fill label for the student to choose according to his or her ID card. After selecting a student, the grades of the courses in which the student will be examined will be filtered and they will be displayed on the graph.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • statisticByTeacher

        void statisticByTeacher(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Is done after filtering by 'teacher'. It hides the fill boxes associated with the course and student and displays a fill label to select from the teacher's ID card. After selecting a teacher, the scores of the tests that the teacher has examined will be filtered and displayed on the graph
        Parameters:
        event -

      • getAvarageAndMedian

        private double[] getAvarageAndMedian(List<?> examList)
        The method receives a list of tests performed and returns a 2-cell array. One for the average score and one for the median score of the test list
        Parameters:
        event -
